about_the_game:
Where am I?

You wake up in a cold and dark cell. You look around. Everything seems abandoned and run-down. All of a sudden, the speaker on the wall activates with a loud and shrill noise.



A voice comes through the speaker. It tells you to leave the room.



Why? Just... why am I here?

But it doesn't want to tell you that. There are several different doors. The rooms behind the doors, have been prepared specifically for YOU. You need to complete multiple tasks to proceed. But in this demo only two rooms are available.

content_descriptors.notes: Graphics are shown in pixel graphics. This game includes topics such as violence, suicide, murder and animal cruelty.

detailed_description:
Where am I?

You wake up in a cold and dark cell. You look around. Everything seems abandoned and run-down. All of a sudden, the speaker on the wall activates with a loud and shrill noise.



A voice comes through the speaker. It tells you to leave the room.



Why? Just... why am I here?

But it doesn't want to tell you that. There are several different doors. The rooms behind the doors, have been prepared specifically for YOU. You need to complete multiple tasks to proceed. But in this demo only two rooms are available.
name: SINNERS Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft® Windows® XP/Vista/7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel® Pentium®4 1.5GHz
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024x768 or better video resolution in High Color mode
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: ©2019 RPG-Stars
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Microsoft® Windows® XP/Vista/7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel® Pentium®4 1.5GHz
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024x768 or better video resolution in High Color mode
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: ©2019 RPG-Stars

short_description: You wake up in a cold and dark cell. You look around. Everything seems abandoned and run-down. All of a sudden, the speaker on the wall activates with a loud and shrill noise. A voice comes through the speaker. It tells you to leave the room. Will you get your freedom back?
